title: Luminary Tour: Cosmoscapes—Ink Paintings by Tai Xiangzhou and Fantastic Landscapes—Hokusai and Hiroshige
title_display: Luminary Tour: Cosmoscapes—Ink Paintings by Tai Xiangzhou and Fantastic Landscapes—Hokusai and Hiroshige
hero_caption: Katsushika Hokusai. Kirifuri Falls at Mount Kurokami in Shimotsuke Province (Shimotsuke Kurokamiyama Kirifuri no taki), from the series A Tour of Waterfalls in Various Provinces (Shokoku taki meguri), about 1833. Clarence Buckingham Collection.
short_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of Cosmoscapes: Ink Paintings by Tai Xiangzhou and Fantastic Landscapes: Hokusai and Hiroshige.
list_description: Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of Cosmoscapes: Ink Paintings by Tai Xiangzhou and Fantastic Landscapes: Hokusai and Hiroshige.
description:
Connect with fellow Luminary members on a guided small-group tour of Cosmoscapes: Ink Paintings by Tai Xiangzhou and Fantastic Landscapes: Hokusai and Hiroshige.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to twelve participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed.

Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable. Find further information on what to expect on our website.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to twelve participants.
